definition: to pick up money and not hide it (idiom); to return property to its owner
to ascend in light steps
to pick up/to collate or arrange/ten (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
(negative prefix)/not/no
to conceal/dark

sentences.english: I think everyone has the possibility except the founder.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲任何人都有可能，除了拾金不昧的人。

sentences.english: Demanded the return of property and return money found plenty of traditional moral contradiction?
sentences.chinese: 拾到財物索要回報與拾金不昧的傳統道德相矛盾？

sentences.english: The extremely honest finder wished to remain anonymous.
sentences.chinese: 這位拾金不昧的好人還希望能保持匿名。
